Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.colofabrix.mathparser.expression.ExpressionEntry
      • com.colofabrix.mathparser.expression.Option

  • public class Option
extends ExpressionEntry
    It represents an option that is configurable in the system
    Author:
    Fabrizio Colonna
